channel.title: [Delta] Making NPC hit harder [Delta]
channel.description: So hey guys i've recently downloaded deltascape and tried to add a minigame but when i do my npcs do not hit harder on people, they hit 0s and 1s does anyone know how to make them hit according your cb level. thanks for any help

item.title: [Delta] Making NPC hit harder [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

make a hit attack in npchandler.java

and make their hitdiff according to combatlevel

hitDiff = plr.CombatLevel - misc.random(plr.CombatLevel);

what that does is the npc’s damage will be your combat minus a random number within your combat level
for instance

if you were 100 combat it would be 100 - anything within 100

that way would be very inaccurate but you could just make it a little lower by decreasing it with somethingelse though.
